category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 33 (Ethical Management Committee)
contents: Article 33 (Ethical Management Committee) The Ethical Management Committee responds to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters related to the establishment of important policies for the promotion of ethical management (mid- to long-term plans, etc.) 2. Matters related to the establishment and opening/closing of ethical management-related regulations 3. Matters related to executives and employeesâ€™ implementation of ethical management-related regulations 4. Other matters Matters considered to be in accordance with the functions of the Ethical Management Committee and submitted by the Chairman [This Article Newly Inserted on July 5, 2023]
